replies.body: What the other person(s) said/did doesn't matter. Your account is your responsibility.

Sorry, but there is no tolrance for hate speach.

You are not shown other's chat logs because you are not being punished for their behavior.

If I were at my computer I would bring down some examples of what you got punished for besides hate speach, but I am not right now.
Hate speech? I can't seem to find it tbh.
There's a zero tolerance policy for racial slurs.  In case you don't know, the N-bomb is a racial slur.  Stop saying it, or you'll continue to get banned.  Period.
its not a racial slur saying the n-word with the hard -er is!

Lol no, not for this game, or else by that logic anyone using it would just use the -a version and claim that what they said wasn't hate speech. The truth is neither are acceptable as they are both use for the same thing. It would be the same thing had you use this type of language at the store, at work, or school they don't care which you are using, as both are offensive!
Hate speech? I can't seem to find it tbh. And other examples? No way, it's like saying Hello - banned-

What it really comes down to is that you need to learn to stop responding to people. Follow these rules:

1. If someone does or says a single thing that upsets you - mute them without responding.
2. If you are doing poorly "/mute all" before anyone has a chance to say anything to you.
3. If you have a team mate doing poorly mute them so their tilt does not rub off on you.
4. If you find yourself not following these simple rules then you need to stop playing for the day because you are too tilted.
